EmailTemplate.name: 202104_Global_GDT_User-Survey_Email.GDT_User-Survey
EmailTemplate.subject: How can we make GoDirect Trade work for you?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello from GoDirect Trade!
We value your feedback and would like to ask you a few questions about your experience so far. Your insight will help us improve our operations for you and customers like you.
Our short survey takes about 1 minute: Take the Survey <https://survey.sjc1.qualtrics.com/jfe/form/SV_d05t5Mr576g2xNQ> Thank you for being part of the GoDirect Trade community!
The GoDirect Trade Team
